title: So Close Yet So Far
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Shopping with you is so much fun, Karin!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, thank you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>You know so many stores, and you took me to a bunch of lovely cafes. I’ll show you around whenever you come to Numazu, alright?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Yeah, that would be great. I’ll look forward to it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ah, hey, lastly, I want to go to that specialty store you took me to once before. It’s around here, right? Please take me there!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Eh.... Ah, yeah, sure. W-, wait for a bit, okay? I’m bringing out the map. I didn’t put that place in today’s route....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I-, it’s nothing! Umm.... I think it’s this way.... Follow me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>W-, we’re here!! We’re finally here! It’s this place, right!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I’m sorry. I thought it was close, but it was so far away.... It seems that I’m still not used to the streets of Tokyo.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Uugh.... I-, it’s fine! Just leave the area around here to me. I’ll see if I can find other stores that you might like too, okay, Yoshiko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
